comments.body:
Note that, we don't need `blockfswithoutformat` now, because in storage test framework, block storage will be tested in Filesystem and Block modes if `CapBlock` is true.

- old `block` equals to new `block` in Block mode
- old `blockfswithformat` equals to new `blockfs`
- old `blockfswithoutformat` equals to new `block` in Filesystem mode
